oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pop Stover and the Trailblazers transcription - Program 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Program 1 of a Palmer "Pop" Stover transcription.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pop Stover; The Trailblazers; Herschel Stover; Bob Stover; Little Johnny Stover; Buddy Stover; Patsy Stover; Clarabelle Stover; Margaret Stover
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Bob Stover performs the opening theme / (1:06) Little Johnny Stover and Bob Stover performs "You Don't Love Me But I'll Always Care" / (2:33) Pop Stover introduces the next performance / (2:50) Buddy Stover performs "Jeanie With The Light Brown Hair" / (3:49) Pop Stover introduces the next performance / (4:02) Patsy, Clarabelle, and Margaret Stover perform "A Drunkard's Child," written by Jimmie Rodgers and Andrew Jenkins / (5:54) Pop Stover introduces the next performance / (6:10) Little Johnny Stover performs "Blue Yodel #4" / (7:40) Bob Stover performs the closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pop Stover and The Trailblazers
